measuretools.make¶

abjad.tools.measuretools.make(meters)¶

Make list of skip-populated rigid measures.

meters must be an iterable of Abjad meter tokens.

abjad> staff = Staff(measuretools.make([(1, 8), (5, 16), (5, 16)]))
abjad> print staff.format
\new Staff {
        {
                \time 1/8
                s1 * 1/8
        }
        {
                \time 5/16
                s1 * 5/16
        }
        {
                \time 5/16
                s1 * 5/16
        }
}
